body: A female official who handled quarantine work has died of fatigue, South Korea's citizen media, Wiki Tree reported today[ko]. As the country faced its worst foot-and-mouth disease outbreak, the workload for quarantine workers has greatly increased lately.
original_body: A female official who handled quarantine work has died of fatigue, South Korea's citizen media, Wiki Tree reported today[ko]. As the country faced its worst foot-and-mouth disease outbreak, the workload for quarantine workers has greatly increased lately.
title: South Korea: During Foot-and-Mouth Disease Outbreak, A Female Official Died of Fatigue

sentence: A female official who handled quarantine work has died of fatigue, South Korea's citizen media, Wiki Tree reported today[ko].
As the country faced its worst foot-and-mouth disease outbreak, the workload for quarantine workers has greatly increased lately.
